title: WTB: T5 Pinkerton Cabinet or T215 Red Cross for the birthday boy
author: packs

posts.post_title: WTB: T5 Pinkerton Cabinet or T215 Red Cross for the birthday boy
posts.post_content:
Hi all,

Its my birthday tomorrow and I'd like to buy myself a nice present. I'm looking for a T5 Pinkerton cabinet (not the postcard) or a T215 Red Cross with nice eye appeal. I want to stay away from trimmed / stained examples. I've got a nice budget to play with. Please do PM me if you have a T5 or T215 for sale. I'd like to pick up a star or a lower tier HOFer.

Thanks guys. Feel free to PM.

There is a nice T5 Bresnahan on ebay with a Make Offer.  I would certainly consider him a low tier HOFer.  Good luck in your quest.

..............and HAPPY BIRTHDAY!

Happy Birthday!!

Last year i bought myself a Sweet upside down OM t206 printer scrap Thebo on my birthday and have been loving it ever since:D

Hope you get what your looking for

Peace

Johnny
Thanks guys. Those cards are a little expensive for my blood. I've got a budget of about $700.
